r.d: This is the Microsoft SQL Server MDB2 driver.
r.n:
first unbundled release from MDB2 core
- dont just check for isset() for boolean values in order to support setting them false as well (bug #4373) - ensure SQL injection protection in all _quote() methods (was missing in some decimal, float, time, date and timestamp implementations) - typo fixes in constructor - Warning: this release is untested
